title: A Field Guide to Fairies
description: There is probably a fairy very close to you right now - in the raindrop on the windows, within that shaft of sunlight or beneath those moving leaves. Fairies live all around us, yet these strange and mysterious creatures are reluctant to be seen by humans. Discover all their secret hiding places in this enthralling guide to fairy lore from around the world. Complete with beautiful illustrations and exquisite pop-up scenes from celebrated fairy legends, "A Field Guide to Fairies" offers an enchanting pathway to the fairy realm.
author: Susannah Marriott
